steps.description: Thaw-Thaw the frozen corn by putting it in a sieve and running it under cold water
steps.modified_description: Thaw-Thaw the frozen corn by putting it in a sieve and running it under cold water. Spill some out while putting corn in seive and spill some corn in sink while thawing

errors.description: spill the corn while adding it to seive
spill some corn in sink while thawing

steps.description: Add-Add the corn into a microwave-safe bowl
Add-1 teaspoon of pepper powder to the bowl
Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.modified_description: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well and spill them out while mixing

steps.description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon salt to the bowl and spill some out

steps.description: add-add lime juice to the bowl
Microwave-Microwave the corn for 3 more minutes
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the corn for 3 more minutes and stop it after 2 mins only

errors.description: stopped the microwave at 2 mins only
